statements: SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, date_of_birth FROM artists WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT artist_name, country, date_of_birth FROM artists ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, country FROM artists WHERE date_of_birth < '1980-01-01'
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, price FROM artists JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id WHERE price > 1000
SELECT * FROM exhibitions WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01'
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS num_artworks FROM artists JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING num_artworks > 5
SELECT * FROM artists
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'Italian'
SELECT artwork_title, price FROM artworks ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists ORDER BY birth_date ASC
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French' ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM artists WHERE birth_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT artist_name, nationality, artwork_title, price FROM artists JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality IN ('Italian', 'Spanish');
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(artwork_id) AS total_artworks FROM artists LEFT JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_artworks > 3;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_nationality FROM artists;
SELECT artwork_title, artwork_creation_date FROM artworks;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, artwork_creation_date FROM artists JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artwork_artist_id;
SELECT exhibition_name, exhibition_start_date, exhibition_end_date FROM exhibitions;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_nationality FROM artists WHERE artist_birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM artworks ORDER BY artwork_creation_date DESC;

SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, exhibition_name FROM artists INNER JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artwork_artist_id INNER JOIN exhibitions ON artworks.artwork_id = exhibition_id WHERE exhibition_start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT artist_name, COUNT(artwork_id) AS total_artworks FROM artists LEFT JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artwork_artist_id GROUP BY artists.artist_id HAVING total_artworks > 5 ORDER BY total_artworks DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_bio FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT exhibition_name, exhibition_date FROM exhibitions WHERE exhibition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name FROM artworks JOIN artists ON artworks.artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT exhibition_name, COUNT(artwork_id) AS total_artworks FROM exhibition_artwork INNER JOIN exhibitions ON exhibition_artwork.exhibition_id = exhibitions.exhibition_id GROUP BY exhibition_name;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, artist_bio FROM artists WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name FROM artworks INNER JOIN artists ON artworks.artist_id = artists.artist_id;
SELECT exhibition_name, exhibition_date FROM exhibitions WHERE exhibition_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT exhibitions.exhibition_name, artworks.artwork_name FROM exhibition_artwork INNER JOIN exhibitions ON exhibition_artwork.exhibition_id = exhibitions.exhibition_id INNER JOIN artworks ON exhibition_artwork.artwork_id = artworks.artwork_id;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists ORDER BY nationality ASC;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM artists WHERE nationality='French';
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM exhibitions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, artwork_name, style, price FROM artists JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT artwork_name, style, price FROM artworks ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT artist_name, exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM artists JOIN artist_artwork ON artists.artist_id = artist_artwork.artist_id JOIN artworks ON artist_artwork.artwork_id = artworks.artwork_id JOIN artwork_exhibition ON artworks.artwork_id = artwork_exhibition.artwork_id JOIN exhibitions ON artwork_exhibition.exhibition_id = exhibitions.exhibition_id;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(artwork_id) AS total_artworks FROM artists JOIN artist_artwork ON artists.artist_id = artist_artwork.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(artwork_id) > 1;
